about_the_game:
A Retro dating-sim roguelite set in a corporate hellscape! Sign the contract and consider your life sold to GREEDCORP. How will your career go?

Fired and on the brink of homelessness, GREEDCORP becomes your LAST HOPE. As you navigate the corporate jungle, An enterprise straight from the fourth circle of hell, maybe get romantical with a few babes. Or will you put your distractions aside and face the challenge of climbing the corporate ladder?

Get raunchy with the girls! WTG Features sexual rewards for making your way through quests!

                                                     ROGUELITE FEATURES.

The WTG (DEMO) IS A ROGUELITE! Your choices in the game will dictate what ending you achieve! There are currently 9+ ENDINGS to find and achieve! The full game will feature countless more endings, floors and characters to experience!

"DRAIN THEIR FUNDS.

SEPERATE THEM. TAKE THEIR HOMES.

AND THEN CONTROL THEM.

LIKE.

DOGS.

I RUN THIS EMPIRE.

I AM THIS EMPIRE"

                          GREEDCORP WILL NOT TOLERATE INSUBORDINATION

WELCOME TO GREEDCORP currently features 3 girls on the FIRST FLOOR, in WTG you will be able to climb the floors eventually making your way to the CEO.

Amber is the ambitious security guard, eager to prove her self and solve a conspiracy lurking in the first floor halls!

Leah, the rebel, petty chaos and schemes are on her mind! Will you join her in the mayhem?

Your boss Cassie struggles against management and the disorder of the first floor, holding it together with duct tape. Be her loyal assistant, or lead her out of the establishment onto different ventures!

WTG's main gameplay mechanic is signing papers, check, stamp, sign, photocopy, shred, paperclip and repeat! Earn DP and use it to TALK TO GIRLS!

We hope to see you in the office.

name: WELCOME TO GREEDCORP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or faster processer
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.40Ghz or faster processer
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: A retro dating simulator, part puzzle game set in a corporate hellscape! Climb the corporate ladder! Or find romance within the cubicles! In office of Greedcorp!
